description: System-generated unique identifier for this procedureâ€“task link record.
ID of the maintenance procedure this task is linked to; likely a foreign key to the procedures master (confirm with SME).
ID of the maintenance task included in the procedure; likely references the task catalog (confirm with SME).
Order of execution for the task within the procedure; lower numbers occur earlier (confirm 0-based with SME).
Estimated asset downtime, in hours, attributable to executing this task within the procedure.
Database timestamp when this record was last updated by any process.
Timestamp captured by the application when a user last edited the record; may mirror the standard last modified time (confirm with SME).
Identifier of the user account that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was first created by a user.
Identifier of the user account that last updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was last changed by a user.
